title: Extremely slow speeds on patching.
body: Anyone else getting really slow speeds for patching to the Beta client? Speedtest is showing I'm at 20MB/s down but when I try to update legacy client to Beta it's at 5 KB/s at the most. Are the servers overloaded or something been hit with a hard CC?

replies.body: It went fine yesterday when I patched.

Hey there,

Still experiencing this issue?
